text:
[Verse]
Woke up to the light
Shining bright and fair
Dancing through the sky
With the wind in my hair

[Verse 2]
Kids are all around
In laughter we share
Feet upon the ground
But hearts are in the air

[Chorus]
Join the sunny day parade
Every worry fades away
Clap your hands and sing along
Celebrate with joyful song

[Verse 3]
Colors all aglow
Rainbows everywhere
Joy begins to grow
In the warmth we care

[Verse 4]
Friends are all we need
In this perfect day
It's a simple creed
Love will lead the way

[Chorus]
Join the sunny day parade
Every worry fades away
Clap your hands and sing along
Celebrate with joyful song
title: Sunny Day Parade
